author: Miguel Justino
comment: The free version was gorgeous and by far more stable than the Pro. The pro crashes immediately every time it starts for me. Support has responded promptly mentioning they're in the process of updating the watchface to resolve some backwards compatibility issues. Once they've fixed it I'll update this review but up until then I can give it no more than 2 stars as it simply doesn't work.

author: Wes Hardin
comment: The free version worked fine - the pro version never worked - only crashed over and over.  Follow instructions to clear cache, etc., but this never did work!  Also - tried the Pathfinder watch face by this vendor and paid for it - it never was available for me to select as a watch face?  These watch faces (paid versions anyway) don't seem to work.    I went so far as to wipe my phone to factory settings and installed just android wear and this Y360 Pro watch face.  Still crashed on the lg g watch r paired with my lg v10 phone - EVERY TIME!  Not worth the money in my opinion.

reply.author: Mobi Market Labs
reply.content: We test all the watchfaces and go through Google check in the publication of the application. If you have any problems please tell us what does not work: the configuration program, or does not appear on the clock face itself or crashes during the operation of the dial? Our pro apps require firmware for watches MWD48B and up. Thanks for feedback.

author: Edson Castaneda
comment: Doesn't work on my phone and watch. Did the un install reseting cache and data. Always crush and stop working
Why did I pay for this?

reply.author: Mobi Market Labs
reply.content:
We plan to release a new version of this application.
Tell the transaction ID (support@mobimarketlabs.com) and we will refund your payment.

author: Bruce W. Mohler
comment: I never could get it to work on my Huawei Watch 2 Classic with Android Wear 2.0.  I reverted to their Interactive version which worked just fine.

reply.author: Mobi Market Labs
reply.content: Currently we are working on an update.
